main.name: Gancheng Luo
main.description: I am a computer science new grad from University of Toronto. My objective position is a Front-end/Web Developer. Currently my career goal is a Full Stack Developer
main.bio: As a beginning developer, I possess a solid computer science foundation and a tidy coding style. I pay attention to not only implementation but also the design. In my opinion, a reasonable design is necessary and could make the development process smooth and clear. Outside of work, my favorite hobby is photography. Visual aesthetics is what I have been always seeking. That's also one of the reasons why I choose to start my career from the front-end.

resume.skillmessage: Recently I put efforts into web development. There are some js frameworks that I did not list here.

education.description: During my time at UofT, I have built a solid basis in computer science, mathematics, and statistics. The most useful soft skills I have learned are self-learning and team-working. I have done plenty of projects in teams in many subjects like web app building, OOP software development, machine learning competition, statistical report, etc.

work.title: Jr Front-end Developer
work.description: Implemented visual elements and user interaction of company product.
